H0.text: What mythical god has a hammer called Miolnir (or Mjölnir, or other variants). Odin

H1.text: What mythical god has a hammer called Miolnir (or Mjölnir, or other variants). Zeus

H2.text: What mythical god has a hammer called Miolnir (or Mjölnir, or other variants). Indra

H3.text: What mythical god has a hammer called Miolnir (or Mjölnir, or other variants). Þór

A4.text: Mjölnir (UK: MYOL-neer, US: MYAWL-neer; from Old Norse Mjǫllnir) is the hammer of the thunder god Thor in Norse mythology.
